Producer: Tono Folguera, Sergi Moreno, Jana Díaz Juhl
Screenwriter: Natalia Tena, Carlos Marques-Marcet, David Verdaguer, Clara Roquet
Production Co: Televisió de Catalunya (TV3), Televisión Española (TVE), Lastor Media, La Panda, MEDIA
Rating: R (Language|Dialogue|Brief Graphic Nudity|Some Strong Sexual Content)
Synopsis: A couple (Natalia Tena, David Verdaguer) try to maintain a long-distance relationship while one lives in Los Angeles and the other in Barcelona, Spain.
Title: Long Distance
